mapper.select: select hc.*,u.id as userid, u.phone as u_phone,u.username,u.real_name,u.nickname,u.email,u.honer_score,u.grade_total,u.grade_times from hh_help_contract hc left join hh_user u on hc.hh_user_id = u.id where hh_help_info_id = #{helpINfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into hh_help_contract (id, status, hh_user_id, hh_help_info_id,create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hhUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hhHelpInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into hh_help_contract
id,
status,
hh_user_id,
hh_help_info_id,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{hhUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{hhHelpInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update hh_help_contract
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hh_user_id = #{hhUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hh_help_info_id = #{hhHelpInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
